column1: Art Institute of Chicago////2) Women were allowed to bring ENORMOUS purses into the museum but tiny (and I mean small enough to be a clutch) knapsacks have to be checked in the coat room for $1.  This is classism - if they want to protect the security of the artworks then all bags larger than XX size should have to be checked.  Also the line for the coatroom was long and the attendants lackadaisical ('Oh
column2: I think I will slowly meander to the coat rack') - truly infuriating.
